item.title: Azure Active Directory Authentication for .NET Core Services
item.description: If upgrading an existing application, the following are required from NuGet: Microsoft.Identity.Web Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI Generating the Project The project in this repository was generated from the ASP.NET Core Web App template. When generating the project, select ‘Microsoft identity platform’ as the Authentication type in the Additional Information section. HTTPS and Docker were also enabled for this project. After installing dotnet msidentity tool, Visual Studio will display the Service Dependencies and Service References.
